title: How to Change the Pointer Speed in Android

steps.title: Press the "menu" button on your phone.
steps.content: Press the "menu" button on your phone. Then, select "Settings".

steps.title: Select the "Language & Keyboard" option towards the bottom of the screen.
steps.content: Select the "Language & Keyboard" option towards the bottom of the screen.

steps.title: Scroll down the Input screen to reach more options towards the bottom.
steps.content: Scroll down the Input screen to reach more options towards the bottom.

steps.title: Slide the knob to the right to increase mouse speed.
steps.content: Slide the knob to the right to increase mouse speed. Slide to the left to decrease it. Click "OK" to keep the new setting.
